statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT first_name, last_name, account_balance FROM customers WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_login > '2021-10-01';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, account_number FROM customers WHERE account_balance < 0;
SELECT last_name, account_balance FROM customers ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, account_balance FROM customers WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, account_number, account_balance FROM customers WHERE account_balance < 5000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC, customer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_login BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY last_login DESC
SELECT customer_id, last_name, account_balance FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' OR first_name LIKE 'M%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, account_balance FROM customers WHERE account_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY account_number ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT customer_name, account_balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE account_balance > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, account_balance FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, customer_name FROM customer_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings';
SELECT recommendation_id, recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, account_balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE account_type='Savings' ORDER BY account_balance ASC;

SELECT customer_name, account_balance, account_type FROM customer_accounts JOIN recommendations ON customer_accounts.account_id = recommendations.customer_id WHERE recommendation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, account_type FROM customer_accounts WHERE account_balance BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY account_type, customer_name;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE account_type='Checking' AND customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM account_information;
SELECT customer_id, account_type, balance FROM account_information ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT customer_id, recommendation_text, date_created FROM recommendations WHERE date_created >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT account_id, customer_id, balance FROM account_information WHERE account_type = 'Savings';
SELECT * FROM account_information ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT account_id, account_type, balance FROM account_information WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_id ASC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, r.recommendation_text FROM customer_profiles c JOIN recommendations r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, a.balance FROM customer_profiles c JOIN account_information a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id WHERE a.balance < 0;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, account_balance FROM customers WHERE account_balance > 0;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date, amount FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, recommendation_text FROM customers INNER JOIN recommendations ON customers.customer_id = recommendations.customer_id WHERE LENGTH(recommendation_text) > 10;
SELECT customer_id, chat_date, chat_text FROM chat_history ORDER BY chat_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, account_balance FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, account_balance, transaction_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT full_name, account_balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM account_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT full_name, account_balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT conversation_text, start_time, end_time FROM chatbot_conversations ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT full_name, account_balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT conversation_id, start_time, end_time FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM personalized_recommendations WHERE DATE(date_created) = '2022-01-15';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM account_transactions WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
